## Properties

| --------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `pattern` | `pattern` | The pattern to filter the matched CSS variables by. Used to target only the names of the CSS variables available from your projects/lib/app. | `string` | `undefined` |
